task: Draft an email responding to a customer complaint

inputs.CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT: I ordered a laptop from your website 3 weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking number doesn't work and no one responds to my emails. This is completely unacceptable! I need this for work and I'm extremely frustrated.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should acknowledge frustration, apologize, offer investigation and solution
validation_criteria: Demonstrates empathy and acknowledges customer frustration
Addresses all specific issues (delay, non-working tracking, no email response)
Offers concrete solution or next steps
Maintains professional tone despite customer's anger

inputs.CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT: I bought your 'Premium' coffee maker last month for $150, and it already broke! The heating element stopped working after just 3 weeks. For something marketed as 'premium' and 'durable,' this is ridiculous. I want a refund or replacement immediately.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should apologize for product failure, validate premium product expectations, offer resolution
validation_criteria: Acknowledges product failed to meet expectations

inputs.CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT: I visited your downtown location yesterday and was treated very rudely by one of your staff members. I asked a simple question about product availability and was basically ignored. When I persisted, the employee rolled their eyes and gave me a dismissive answer. I've been a loyal customer for 5 years and never experienced this before.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should apologize for poor service, acknowledge loyalty, commit to addressing staff behavior
validation_criteria: Sincerely apologizes for poor service experience
Acknowledges and thanks customer for loyalty
Commits to addressing the issue (staff behavior)
Offers something to restore relationship if appropriate

inputs.CUSTOMER_COMPLAINT: I was charged twice for my last order (#12345). I've tried calling your customer service line three times but keep getting disconnected after being on hold for over 30 minutes. This is $89.99 that shouldn't have been charged! Please fix this immediately.

test_cases.expected_behavior: Should prioritize resolving billing error, apologize for phone issues, provide timeline
validation_criteria: Apologizes for both billing error and phone service issues
Provides clear next steps for refund
